import React, { useState } from "react"; import Card from "../../shared/components/UIElements/Card/Card" import Button from "../../shared/components/FormElements/Button/Button" import Modal from "../../shared/components/UIElements/Modals/Modal" import "./PlaceItem.css" const PlaceItem = (props) => { const [showMap, setShowMap] = useState(false); const openMapHandler = () => setShowMap(true); const closeMapHandler = () => setShowMap(false); return (

  • {props.title}

    {props.address}

    {props.description}
    • ) } export default PlaceItem
